headline: PayPal Faces Lawsuits And CEO Change As Valuation Gap Widens
summary: Multiple class action lawsuits have been filed against PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) alleging securities fraud tied to its communications about growth and key initiatives. The company has withdrawn its 2027 financial targets, removing a previously stated long term guide for investors. PayPal has announced a CEO change and is the subject of early stage takeover interest from Stripe, according to reports. PayPal Holdings, trading at $46.21, is dealing with several major developments at once...
